kw.name: Gerar dados de usuário dinâmico para o cadastro
Name
kw.msg: ${username} = Tiffany Mercado
kw.doc: :example: 'John Doe'

kw.name: Email
kw.msg: ${email} = kwhitaker@example.net

kw.name: Password
kw.msg: ${password} = )8H2ULSfPc
kw.doc: Generate a random password of the specified ``length``.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.msg: &{USER} = { name=Tiffany Mercado | email=kwhitaker@example.net | password=)8H2ULSfPc }
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.
